subject: Olympic Games
Boxing
Olympic Games (2012)
lead_paragraph: Boxers who won in the Olympic Trials but did not place high enough at the world championships to qualify for the London Games, must win another tournament to advance to a final Olympic qualifier.
snippet: Boxers who won in the Olympic Trials but did not place high enough at the world championships to qualify for the London Games, must win another tournament to advance to a final Olympic qualifier.
